name: PET HOSPITAL
description:
The best veterinary clinic game on the Nintendo 3DS™! Hamsters, birds, cats, dogs, horses... become a real veterinarian and take care of your favourite animals!

Dr Robert's clinic is going through difficult times and needs your skills to develop and expand. Examinations, diagnostics and treatments: heal your patients and unlock new veterinary health centres so you can receive all patients furred and feathered.

Features:

  • Impressive vet simulation in 3D
  • Fur shaded animals
  • 23 treatments and operations
